item.title: 米莱重燃熄火的房地产市场，抵押贷款增加两倍
item.description:
阿根廷总统的经济转机包括努力唤醒沉睡多年的贷款业

。【原文：

The Argentine president’s economic turnaround includes efforts to reawaken a lending industry that’s been dormant for years

】

item.title: 部长称土耳其与阿布扎比港口交易谈判失败
item.description: 一位土耳其官员表示，AD 港口集团收购土耳其西部港口经营权的谈判已经失败，这对土耳其吸引阿联酋投资的雄心造成了打击。【原文：AD Ports Group’s negotiations to acquire the operating rights for a port in western Turkey have failed, a Turkish official said, marking a blow to the country’s ambitions of attracting investments from the United Arab Emirates.】

item.title: 韩国追随特朗普，要求对中国钢铁征收关税
item.description: 继特朗普政府采取类似措施后，韩国正寻求对部分中国钢铁和生产商征收关税，原因是担心大量廉价产品涌入市场。【原文：South Korea is seeking to implement tariffs on some Chinese steel and producers on concerns over an influx of cheaper products flooding the market, following a similar measure from the Trump administration.】

item.title: 交易商扎堆购买 VIX 看涨对冲产品加剧了交易商的压力
item.description: 一些策略师警告说，通过买入 VIX 看涨期权来对冲股市风险已经成为一种非常流行的交易，它可能会成为一种破坏稳定的力量。【原文：Hedging stock-market risk by buying VIX calls has become such a popular trade that it could turn into a destabilizing force, some strategists warn.】

item.title: 沙特 Tadawul 集团希望通过更多并购来促进资本市场发展
item.description: 沙特 Tadawul 集团表示，该集团正在瞄准更多并购项目，以进一步发展当地资本市场并吸引外国投资者。【原文：Saudi Tadawul Group said it’s targeting more mergers and acquisitions as it looks to further develop the local capital market and draw in foreign investors.】

item.title: 面对不断扩大的资金缺口，法国重启养老金争夺战
item.description: 法国国家审计员称，公共养老金系统的赤字将在未来几年急剧扩大，这在对总理弗朗索瓦-巴伊鲁政府的存亡至关重要的谈判前发出了警告。【原文：France’s state auditor said the public pension system’s deficit is set to widen sharply in coming years, sounding a warning ahead of negotiations that are crucial for the survival of Prime Minister Francois Bayrou’s government.】

item.title: 让美国再次建造大型船舶的计划
item.description:
马克-凯利（Mark Kelly）和托德-杨（Todd Young）参议员谈《SHIPS for America法案》。【原文：

Senators Mark Kelly and Todd Young on the SHIPS for America Act.

】

item.title: 奇货可居：让美国重新造船的计划（播客）
item.description: 美国在许多重要行业都占据主导地位，但在一个关键领域却一直落后：造船业。如今，大约有 80 艘悬挂美国国旗的船只参与全球贸易，而悬挂中国国旗的船只则超过 5500 艘。令人担忧的是，美国在这一国际贸易的重要组成部分上已经落后，整个国家的经济可能面临被扼杀的风险。美国 SHIPS 法案》是一项罕见的两党提案，旨在增加【原文：The US is a dominant force in a number of important industries, but it’s been lagging behind in one crucial area: shipbuilding. Today, there are about 80 US-flagged ships involved in global trade, compared to more than 5,500 China-flagged vessels. The worry is that the US has been falling behind in this important component of international commerce, and that the country’s entire economy could be at risk of being choked off. The SHIPS for America Act is a rare bipartisan proposal that aims to add】

item.title: 花旗策略师警告 S&P 500 指数反弹正触及短期顶峰
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：The 4.5% rally in US stocks this year is likely as good as it gets for now due to risks from President Donald Trump’s policy proposals, according to Citigroup Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 欧洲央行斯托纳拉斯称 2025 年关键利率可能降至 2% 左右
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员亚尼斯-斯托纳拉斯（Yannis Stournaras）表示，欧洲中央银行的关键利率 "可能在2025年降至2%左右"。【原文：The European Central Bank’s key interest rate “could fall to around 2% in the course of 2025,” Governing Council member Yannis Stournaras said.】

item.title: 泛欧交易所 "外债之战 "再起，目标直指散户交易者
item.description: 泛欧交易所（Euronext NV）计划通过吸引零售交易商，挑战德意志交易所数十年来在欧洲债券期货领域的霸主地位。【原文：Euronext NV plans to challenge Deutsche Börse AG’s decades-long hegemony of European bond futures by appealing to retail traders.】

item.title: 如果特朗普与普京达成协议，习近平将面临成为美国头号威胁的风险
item.description: 对习近平主席来说，俄罗斯结束乌克兰战争带来了许多机遇，也带来了一个重大威胁：中国将突然成为美国军事的主要焦点。【原文：For President Xi Jinping, an end to Russia’s war in Ukraine brings many opportunities and one major threat: China would suddenly become the main focus of the US military.】

item.title: 中国出资 30 亿美元的印尼镍冶炼厂面临停产风险
item.description: 印度尼西亚最大的镍冶炼厂之一在其中国母公司倒闭仅几个月后就削减了产量，并接近完全停产。【原文：One of the biggest nickel smelters in Indonesia has slashed production and is close to shutting down completely, just months after the collapse of its Chinese parent company.】

item.title: 南非预算案关键细节被保密后真相大白
item.description: 两周前，南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）向同事们介绍了即将公布的预算要点，但为了防止预算泄露，他略去了一个关键细节，这在南非联合政府中引发了一场重大风波。【原文：South African Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana presented highlights of his upcoming budget to colleagues two weeks ago, but skipped a crucial detail to stop it from leaking — triggering a major fallout in the nation’s coalition government.】

item.title: 新加坡邮政在前景充满挑战的情况下宣布裁员
item.description: 作为重组的一部分，新加坡邮政将裁减约 45 名员工，这至少是自举报人举报邮政服务提供商伪造部分包裹投递数据以来的第三次人事变动。【原文：Singapore Post will be cutting its headcount by about 45 employees as part of a restructuring, in what’s at least the third instance of personnel changes since a whistleblower report alleged the postal services provider was fudging some parcels delivery data.】

item.title: 经济低迷，BE半成品订单不及预期，股价暴跌
item.description: 由于行业持续低迷，必益半导体工业公司第四季度订单减少。该公司股票在阿姆斯特丹的跌幅高达 11%。【原文：BE Semiconductor Industries NV’s fourth-quarter orders fell as an extended industry downturn continued. The stock slumped as much as 11% in Amsterdam.】

item.title: 部长称马克龙下周将在美国会谈中为欧洲辩护
item.description: 一位法国部长表示，法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙下周在华盛顿会见美国总统唐纳德-特朗普时将捍卫欧洲在乌克兰问题上的利益。【原文：French President Emmanuel Macron will defend Europe’s interests regarding Ukraine when he meets US President Donald Trump in Washington next week, a French minister said.】

item.title: 印度水电公司计划扩大其唯一的煤炭项目
item.description: 印度水电生产商 SJVN 有限公司董事长 Raj Kumar Chaudhary 表示，该公司正计划扩建其在该国东部地区唯一在建的煤电项目。【原文：Indian hydropower producer SJVN Ltd. is planning to expand its only coal power project under construction in the eastern part of the country, according to chairman Raj Kumar Chaudhary.】

item.title: 盎格鲁集团与智利 Codelco 公司签署铜矿开发协议
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）与智利国家矿业公司 Codelco 签署了一项协议，共同开发双方相邻的 Los Bronces 和 Andina 业务。【原文：Anglo American Plc has signed a pact with Chile’s state mining company Codelco to jointly develop their adjacent Los Bronces and Andina operations.】

item.title: Centrica 加强回购并启动 40 亿英镑支出计划
item.description: Centrica Plc 计划向投资者返还更多现金，同时启动一项 40 亿英镑（50 亿美元）的投资计划。【原文：Centrica Plc plans to return more cash to investors, even as it opens a £4 billion ($5 billion) investment program.】

item.title: 欧洲银行将迎来 1997 年以来的最佳连胜期
item.description: 欧洲银行在财报季中一帆风顺，并承诺进行大规模股票回购，为其自 1997 年以来的最佳连胜势头再添一把火。【原文：European banks have sailed through the earnings season and are promising massive share buybacks, adding fuel to their best winning streak since 1997.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯 SMC 计划在最新医疗保健产品发行中进行首次公开募股
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯的 SMC 医院正计划在利雅得进行首次公开募股，加入沙特医疗保健公司上市的行列。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s SMC Hospitals is planning an initial public offering in Riyadh, joining the host of health-care firms going public in the kingdom.】

item.title: 英美资源集团再遭戴比尔斯公司减记，利润下滑
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）再次对陷入困境的戴比尔斯钻石公司（De Beers）进行减值，并公布利润下滑，该矿业公司正在对其业务进行彻底改革。【原文：Anglo American Plc took another writedown on its struggling De Beers diamond unit, and posted a slide in profit, as the miner moves ahead with a radical overhaul of its business.】

item.title: 全球最大矿商因铁矿石的中国问题而陷入困境
item.description: 世界上最大的矿商曾一度从中国对铁矿石的巨大需求中获利，如今却开始受到其主要客户经济困境的影响。【原文：The world’s biggest miners, having cashed in on China’s once-rampant demand for iron ore, are starting to reel from the impact of their main customer’s economic struggles.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市小幅反弹，英镑维持在 1.26 美元附近
新加坡 Abaxx 交易所计划推出黄金期货，因黄金价格飙升
item.description: 新加坡阿巴克斯交易所（Abaxx Exchange）计划在未来几个月内推出黄金期货，今年以来，随着交易商努力应对主要金银枢纽的中断和避风港需求的增加，黄金价格创下了新的纪录。【原文：Singapore’s Abaxx Exchange plans to introduce gold futures in the coming months, with prices setting fresh records this year as traders grapple with disruptions in key bullion hubs and increased haven demand.】

item.title: 特朗普的加沙计划引发不确定性，埃及将维持利率不变
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的贸易关税和有争议的将巴勒斯坦人迁出加沙的提议激起了经济的不确定性，埃及可能将推迟开始其期待已久的货币宽松周期。【原文：Egypt will probably delay the start of its long-awaited monetary-easing cycle, as Donald Trump’s trade tariffs and controversial proposal to relocate Palestinians from Gaza stoke economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 肯尼亚今年旅游业收入将增长 24%，达到 43 亿美元
item.description: 旅游业是肯尼亚的主要外汇来源之一，肯尼亚预计今年旅游业收入将激增 24%，达到 5600 亿先令（43.3 亿美元）。【原文：Kenya expects earnings from tourism, one of the nation’s main sources of foreign currency, will surge 24% to 560 billion shillings ($4.33 billion) this year.】

item.title: 调查显示，计划涨薪的日本企业比例创历史新高
item.description: 帝国数据库（Teikoku Databank）的一项调查显示，超过 60% 的日本公司计划在明年提高工人工资，以招聘和留住员工，这一比例创下历史新高。【原文：More than 60% of Japanese companies — a record high percentage — plan to raise workers’ wages next year as they fight to recruit and retain staff, according to a survey by Teikoku Databank.】

item.title: 泰本将通过长期基金返还外部资本
item.description: 泰本资本管理公司（Tybourne Capital Management）在关闭其美国技术对冲基金后不久，又进一步退出了为客户管理公开市场投资的业务。【原文：Tybourne Capital Management is further retreating from the business of managing public market investments for clients, shortly after closing its US technology hedge fund.】
